actions.command: execute as @e[tag=ArchaeologistPot,limit=1] run power grant @s archaeologist:pot/setup_and_tick
execute as @e[tag=ArchaeologistPot,limit=1] run power grant @s archaeologist:pot/fof
execute store result storage archaeologist:current_uuid uuid int 1 run scoreboard players get @s archaeologistUUID
function archaeologist:pot/give_armor_stand_uuid with storage archaeologist:current_uuid
execute store result score %potbool global run resource get @s archaeologist:archaeologist/fof_resource_friend
execute if score %potbool global matches 1 run resource set @e[tag=ArchaeologistPot,limit=1] archaeologist:pot/fof 1
tag @e[tag=ArchaeologistPot] remove ArchaeologistPot

action.command: summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~-0.5 ~ {NoGravity:1b, Small:1b, Invisible:1b, Marker:1b, Tags:['ArchaeologistPot']}
